text: Bill Russo (June 19, 1947 â€“ October 2, 2021) was an American football coach. He was the head football at Wagner College from 1978 to 1980 and at Lafayette College from 1981 to 1999. In 1988, 1992 and 1994 Russo coached the Lafayette Leopards. He was born in New York City. Russo died on October 2, 2021 in Asheville, North Carolina at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:College football coaches Category:American football coaches Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Bill Russo (American football)
